appDescription.message: Get AI-powered buying advice for products with one click

getAiAnalysis.message: Get AI-powered analysis for the current page

settingsSubtitle.message: Customize your button names and questions. The context (current URL) is always included automatically.

tipText.message: The context (current page URL) is automatically added before your question, so you don't need to include it in your question text.

thisIsTheText.message: This is the text shown on the button

contextWillBePrepended.message: The context (URL) will be automatically prepended to this question

buttonSaved.description: Success message after saving button config

urlCannotBeEmpty.description: Error when URL field is empty

errorSaving.description: Generic error message when saving fails

areYouSureReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults?

removeButtonConfirm.description: Confirmation dialog for removing a button

mustHaveAtLeastOne.message: You must have at least one button
mustHaveAtLeastOne.description: Error when trying to remove all buttons

noActivetabFound.description: Error when no tab is active

errorOpeningAIService.description: Error when opening AI Service fails

buyingAdviceQuestion.message:
I need buying advice for this product, please help me understand:
- Is this a good deal?
- What are the pros and cons?
- Are there better alternatives?
- What should I consider before buying?
- Is this product worth the price?
- What do the reviews say? Do they appear authentic, or do they show signs of AI generation and manipulation?
- What's the price history? Has it been cheaper before?
- Are there any hidden or long-term costs (accessories, maintenance, subscriptions)?

contentAnalysisQuestion.message:
Analyze this content for editorial bias
Identify any omitted context, missing facts, or logical leaps
Verify authenticity and logic
What is the primary goal (e.g., to inform, persuade, or sell). Identify if the content uses 'outrage engagement' or specific emotional triggers to influence a vote, a purchase, or social sharing.

languageHelperText.message: Select your preferred language (will be applied immediately)

aiServiceUrlHelperText.message: Enter the URL where AI Chat should open
